column5: I am taking my son up to canada fishing in a couple of weeks, he is nineteen so i was wondering what the legal drinking age is in canada. thanks

He is legal. Of course, drinking alcohol in the boat is illegal regardless of age. Watch out for that Canadian beer, I've seen it destroy a few young Americans' fishing experience in the past. Although watching them puke over the side of the boat in the morning is quite humourous.
